name: com.unity.ide.rider
description: The JetBrains Rider Editor package provides an integration for using the JetBrains Rider IDE as a code editor for Unity. It adds support for generating .csproj files for code completion and auto-discovery of installations.

_upm.changelog:
- fixes RIDER-74818 Unity doesn't get to play mode if Editor is not running and user starts debug or profiling
- Improve performance of project generation - avoid using Directory.Exists
- avoid doing ProjectGeneration twice on the first start-up
